
/*CSS modals*/
.modal-header,.modal-header h4, .close {
      background-color:#2f2f2f;;
      color:white !important;
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 30px;
}
.modal-footer {
      background-color: #f9f9f9;
}
.modal-dialog{
	top:100px;
}

	background-color:#8db0f2;
	height:55px;	
}

}
